TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBar extends System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl

summary.span: 为一组命令或控件提供容器。

span.span: Provides a container for a group of commands or controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件提供溢出的机制，该机制将不适合的项放置在 溢出区中。 controls provide an overflow mechanism that places items that do not fit on the into an overflow area. 用户只能移动或调整父元素中的 toolbar 元素 。Only toolbar elements within a parent can be moved or resized by the user. 是一个 ，它表示对象的标头和集合可以是任何类型 (例如字符串、图像或面板) 。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. ## 自定义工具栏控件Customizing the ToolBar Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置 ，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息 ，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态 ，请参阅 [工具栏样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/toolbar-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToolBar Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/toolbar-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在中创建 。The following example shows how to create a inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#1)]

span.span: WPF Controls Gallery Sample

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏应位于 中的什么位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates where the toolbar should be located in the .
The band of the in which the toolbar is positioned.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中的位置 取决于 、 和属性的值 。The position of the in a depends on the values of the , , and properties. 当 设置为时 ，带区表示中的行 。When is set to , a band represents a row in the . 当 为时 ，带区表示的列 。When is , a band represents a column of the . 下表描述了、和之间的关系 。The following table describes the relationship between , , and . |方向Orientation|通Band|System.windows.controls.toolbar.bandindexBandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |横向Horizontal|指示定位到的行 。Indicates the row in which the is positioned. 设置为较小值的工具栏超出了值较大的工具栏。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|指示上的位置 。Indicates the position of the on the . 设置为较小值的工具栏位于值较大的工具栏中。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |垂直Vertical|指示定位到的列 。Indicates the column in which the is positioned. 设置为较小值的工具栏位于值较大的工具栏中。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|指示上的位置 。Indicates the position of the on the . 设置为较小值的工具栏超出了值较大的工具栏。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性将控件放置在 中 。The following example shows how use this property to place controls inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#2)]

span.span: The position of a toolbar on the band of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未显式设置此属性，则其值由 在中设置的顺序确定 。If you do not explicitly set this property, its value is determined by the order in which the is set in the . 例如，如果在中放置了两个工具栏 而不设置 和 属性，则 这两个工具栏的值都将为0。For example, if you put two toolbars in a without setting the and properties, the value of will be 0 for both toolbars. 对于第一个工具栏，值为0，第二个工具栏的值为1。The value of will be 0 for the first toolbar and 1 for the second toolbar. 在中的位置 取决于 、 和属性的值 。The position of the in a depends on the values of the , , and properties. 当 设置为时 ，带区表示中的行 。When is set to , a band represents a row in the . 当 为时 ，带区表示的列 。When is , a band represents a column of the . 下表描述了、和之间的关系 。The following table describes the relationship between , , and . |方向Orientation|通Band|System.windows.controls.toolbar.bandindexBandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |横向Horizontal|指示定位到的行 。Indicates the row in which the is positioned. 设置为较小值的工具栏超出了值较大的工具栏。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|指示上的位置 。Indicates the position of the on the . 设置为较小值的工具栏位于值较大的工具栏中。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |垂直Vertical|指示定位到的列 。Indicates the column in which the is positioned. 设置为较小值的工具栏位于值较大的工具栏中。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|指示上的位置 。Indicates the position of the on the . 设置为较小值的工具栏超出了值较大的工具栏。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性将控件放置在 中 。The following example shows how use this property to place controls inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#2)]

span.span: if there are items on the toolbar that are not visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 包含的项多于要显示的空间数，则将剩余项放在其溢出区域中。If a has more items than it has the space to show, it puts the remaining items in its overflow area. 用户可以单击上的箭头 来访问溢出项。The user can click the arrow on the to access the overflow items. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the item is an overflow item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是一个只读附加属性。This property is a read-only attached property. 只读附加属性是不常见的，无需直接 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 使用。Read-only attached properties are uncommon, and have no direct [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage. 但是，可以使用附加的属性引用作为样式中的属性触发器，将不同的样式值应用于溢出面板中工具栏内的项。However, you can use the attached property reference as a property trigger in a style, to apply different style values to an item within a toolbar that is in the overflow panel. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks.

Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: The arguments for the event.

summary.span: 为在 上的某个项上按任意键时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when a key is pressed on an item in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 HOME 时，中的第一项将 接收键盘焦点。When the user presses HOME, the first item in the receives keyboard focus. 用户按 "END" 时，中的最后一项将 接收键盘焦点。When the user presses END, the last item in the receives keyboard focus. 发生这种情况时，此实现 通过将 事件数据的属性设置为来将事件标记为已处理 `true` 。When this occurs, this implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

para.span: 如果重写 ，请始终在实现中调用基实现 。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 未能调用基实现会阻止基类使用类处理程序来处理事件，这可能会更改最终类的运行时行为。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以在特殊处理之前或之后调用基本实现，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnLostMouseCapture(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnLostMouseCapture (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The arguments for the event.

summary.span: 为 丢失鼠标捕获时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现不会更改 事件数据的属性) 的已处理状态 ( 。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果重写 ，请始终在实现中调用基实现 。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 未能调用基实现会阻止基类使用类处理程序来处理事件，这可能会更改最终类的运行时行为。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以在特殊处理之前或之后调用基本实现，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
